content.question: The Röttgen Pietà likely affected its original viewers by

choices.label: modeling pious behavior through life-size figures
overwhelming their senses through the lavish use of precious materials
encouraging them to identify with the human suffering of Mary and Christ
distancing them from the holy figures who inhabit the heavenly realm

content.answer: encouraging them to identify with the human suffering of Mary and Christ
